description:
Fun socks for the trail, or for those of us that like add a little colour to our business casual. Made from a light merino wool blend, the Landscape socks are warm, wicking, and breathable.

  • Merino wool blend wicks away moisture and is naturally antimicrobial for comfort and odour management
  • Cushioned sole provides added comfort for long days on the trail
  • Ribbed arch ring wraps your foot for extra support
name: Tilley Landscape Socks - Unisex
